title: Httpe routes
description: Definition of routes and linked actions for the httpe server

on.description: definition of the trigger for the 'do' action, case-sensitive

methods.description: optional http methods, case-insensitive, if omitted, matching path applies to any method

do.description: definition of what to do if request matches the route

script.description: a command or script to execute, supports templating

interpreter.description: interpreter used to execute the command or script such as '/bin/bash' or 'powershell'

timeout.description: timeout (seconds, float) after which the script execution will be aborted

with.description: optional options applied to the request

auth_hashing.description: hashing algorithm, if omitted, passwords are considered to be clear text

on_success.description: What to respond if script terminates successfully (exit code = 0)

http_status.description: http status code of the success response, supports templating

body.description: http body of the success response

on_error.description: What to respond if script terminates with an error (exit code > 0)

http_status.description: http status code of the error response

body.description: http body of the error response, supports templating

with_headers.description: optional http headers send with the response, applies to success and error response
